title: Liulf
description: WHEN HE COULDN'T FIND HER IN HIS WORLD, HE WENT ELSEWHERE.First of a series of three novellas about the Brothers Cu Ahlee.New York Times & USA Today Bestselling author, Victoria Danann, wrote this series as a follow up, based on Moonlight, Best Vampire~Shifter Novel of 2013.For hundreds of years the Scotia wolves have lived in the Highlands and enjoyed the protection of the Fae Monarchy, but the world is changing and the straining population compels the werewolves to adapt. Or die. Or MOVE.
author: Victoria Danann
